item.title: Electronics lab
item.description: Sign up for next Electronics lab course There is currently no course to sign up for See all makerspace courses

item.title: Film and pod studio
item.description: Sign up for the next Film and pod studio introductionary course Go to the form and register to the next course Register to course See all makerspace courses

item.title: Metal
item.description: About About The metal workshop at T-RAX is your ultimate creative playground! Our workshop provides an array of tools and machines that empower you to turn metal into custom-crafted masterpieces limited only by your imagination. Among the equipment at your disposal are saws, a lathe, welding equipment, milling machine, and hydraulic press. Furthermore, we offer a variety of specialized grinders and dedicated workstations to support your metalworking endeavors. To gain access to our facilities, simply enroll in our next metalworking course.

item.title: Rapid prototyping
item.description: About About Are you passionate about innovation, technology, and design? Ever wanted to explore the limitless possibilities of turning your ideas into tangible prototypes? Welcome to our Rapid Prototyping Lab, where your creativity meets technology! Our lab is equipped with tools designed to bring your concepts to life. Here, you'll find 3D printers capable of printing in a variety of materials, such as PLA and PETG, allowing you to create prototypes in no time.

item.title: Textile workshop
item.description: About About Are you intrigued by the world of fabric, colors, and design? Have you ever wanted to unlock the secrets of creating beautiful textiles and transforming ordinary materials into works of art? Look no further! Our Textile Workshop is the perfect place for you to unleash your creativity, learn new skills, and immerse yourself in the captivating world of textiles. In the textile workshop, you can find two industrial sewing machines and an overlock machine.

item.title: VR studio
item.description: Virtual Reality introduction VR courses are held when there is enough interest from members. The courses are held by the day staff. Either contact us on messenger or talk to them directly during school hours. Register to course See all makerspace courses

item.title: Wood workshop
item.description: About About The wood workshop at T-RAX is the perfect place for you to unleash your creativity! Our wood workshop offers a wide range of tools and machines that can help you transform a simple log into beautifully designed furniture or whatever your imagination can conceive. Some of the machines available include a panel saw, band saw, jointer-planer, and drill press. Additionally, we have various types of sanders and preparation areas to assist with your woodworking projects.
